mapper.insert: insert into salary (basic, bonus, social, rewandpun, year, month, employeeid) values (#{basic},#{bonus},#{social},#{rewAndPun},#{year},#{month},#{employeeId});
mapper.update: update salary set basic = #{basic},bonus=#{bonus},social=#{social},rewAndPun=#{rewAndPun},year=#{year},month=#{month},employeeId=#{employeeId} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select * from salary where year=#{year} and month=#{month};
select * from salary where employeeid=#{employeeId} limit #{1},#{2};
